name: Legenda 4 Kristal (GingerSun Games)
description:
Embark on a fantasy adventure! You play a role of a powerful hero on his quest to get into a deep, recruit your teammate , explore the world and fight the evil that looms there. Only the true hero can get the power legendary of 4 crystal.

Feature : Classic RPG Combat System , Animated Skill , Story Driven Quest , Exploring , Randomized monster and loot , Get Over 12 character for your teammate
